MistEffects.Description: Adds mist during rainy days to many maps. This does impact performance, so disable this if you're experiencing lag on rainy days.

SandboxLayout.Description: Turns the farmland into a huge dirt field, similar to the standard farm. Perfect for players who want full control over map design.

RemoveFences.Description: Removes pre-built fences on the farm.

RemoveGrassStretch.Description: Removes the long bit of grass adjacent to the dirt crop field.

RemoveLandExpansionPond.Description: Removes pond from later game expanded area of farm

GrassCropField.Description: Changes the large dirt field to grass.

HeavyDebris.Description: Fills the farm landscape with a plethora of resources.

LargerBridgeToGrandpasShed.Description: Extends the patched bridge height by 1 tile, making it connect better with player-laid paths that are 2 tiles in height.

LargerGreenhouse.Description: Makes the greenhouse slightly bigger, with designated fruit tree spots.

RemoveGreenhouseObjects.Description: Removes static objects, such as plants and barrels, from the greenhouse interior.

Changes.Target: Maps/z_petbowl, Maps/z_FarmCliff_Shadow, Maps/GrandpasGrove_Shadows1, Maps/GrandpasGrove_Shadows2, Maps/z_FarmCliff_Copper, Maps/z_FarmCliff_Iron, Maps/z_FarmCliff_Gold, Maps/z_FarmCliff_Gems, Maps/z_FarmCliff_Blank
